/* eslint-disable max-len */ import React, { useState } from 'react' import { BrowserRouter as Router, Switch, Route, } from 'react-router-dom' import Header from '../../components/header/Header' import Footer from '../../components/footer/Footer' import Home from '../Home/Home' import Courses from '../Courses/Courses' import MyCourses from '../MyCourses/MyCourses' import Authors from '../Authors/Authors' import Account from '../Account/Account' import Cart from '../Cart/Cart' import styles from './MainPage.module.scss' import SignUpComponent from '../../components/Account/SignUp/SignUpComponent' import SignInComponent from '../../components/Account/SignIn/SignInComponent' const MainPage = () => { const [accountState] = useState('SignIn') return (
{accountState === 'SignIn' ? : }
) } export default MainPage
